fields.description:
Steps:
# deploy Kitchensink in subdirectory on a webserver
# open "Web view" demo
# Click "remote url"
Actual result: absent page is displayed because of missing subdir path
Expected result: subdirectory should be included.
Hint: use Ti._5.getAbsolutePath function
fields.summary: MobileWeb: WebView works incorrectly when app is deployed not in server web root
